Uses of Package
org.daisy.pipeline.modules

  • Packages that use org.daisy.pipeline.modules 
    Package Description
    org.daisy.pipeline.modules
    Modules are resource sets which may include xpl, xslt, css, schemas or any other kind of file grouped under a common name and version.
    org.daisy.pipeline.modules.impl.resolver
    URI resolver which uses the tracked modules' components to translate a public URI to a Source object
    org.daisy.pipeline.modules.impl.tracker
    Module tracking used to manage any module loaded into the framework.
  • Classes in org.daisy.pipeline.modules used by org.daisy.pipeline.modules 
    Class and Description
    Component
    Module component now based on expath package components.
    Entity
    Entity represents a public id and its path inside the module.
    Module
    Daisy pipeline module holds a set of components accessible via their uri, its name, version and dependencies.
    ResourceLoader
    The Interface ResourceLoader allows to get an accessible URI from the path provided.
  • Classes in org.daisy.pipeline.modules used by org.daisy.pipeline.modules.impl.resolver 
    Class and Description
    ModuleRegistry
    ModuleRegistry offers the functionality to enregister and query for the modules loaded.
  • Classes in org.daisy.pipeline.modules used by org.daisy.pipeline.modules.impl.tracker 
    Class and Description
    Module
    Daisy pipeline module holds a set of components accessible via their uri, its name, version and dependencies.
    ModuleRegistry
    ModuleRegistry offers the functionality to enregister and query for the modules loaded.
